features: Bulk Flash Drive 128MB: you will get 50 pieces of 128MB USB 2.0 flash drives and 50 lanyards, double tested before shipping; Small and light body, easy to carry and use; Tips: flash drives and lanyards are packaged separately, and the lanyard needs to be installed by yourself; The lanyard may be knotted during long distance transportation, please understand

Reliable and Safe: with proven high standard stable storage technology, the USB thumb drive 128MB provides fast data transfer speed, helps to protect your data and prevent data loss, adopts quality chip, can be applied for a long time

Swivel Cover Design: the USB 2.0 thumb drives bulk is designed with a metal rotating cover, so you won't lose the cover when carrying it; It can be turned back in any position for your convenience; Comes with a lanyard to attach to the chain

Widely Compatible and Plug and Play: compatible with USB 2.0/1.1/1.0, without any software, can be applied for PC, TV, speaker, computer, notebook, car audio and other USB devices; An ideal choice for companies, schools, weddings, customers, or a good choice for business gifts

USB 2.0 Interface: these portable U disks of ours adopt high read and write speeds, and the data transfer speed is fast; The flash drive package transfers data to and from your device quickly and steadily; No driver installation required, metal body, small and light, easy to carry
body.description: Features: Sufficient quantity: 50 Pieces 128MB USB flash drives make it easy for you to organize files, music, pictures and more. Make your work and life easier, don't worry about losing it, you can make multiple backup flash drives at the same time. Nice performance: Bulk flash drives are double tested before shipping to ensure the quality. The swivel design allows them to slide over the USB end and prevents any damage. Specifications: Capacity: 128 MB Interface type: USB 2.0, backwards compatible to USB 1.1/1.0 Compatibility: PC, laptop, tablet and any device with USB port Package includes: 50 x USB 2.0 flash drives bulk Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors in size. Colors may vary slightly due to different screen displays. The brands related above are only for purposes of demonstrating compatibility, not use as trademarks, our trademark is Aoriher.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.1 4.1 out of 5 stars 101 ratings 4.1 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I buy flash drives often for putting music on to sell. This was first time with this brand. Good quality material. I have them engraved locally and these flash drives didn't have any "GB" print on them so was able to engrave easily on both sides.I ordered 250 and 3 of them were defective but Amazon gave me a small partial refund to cover the defective ones.Will buy again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value no problem with them.
reviews.reviewText: I like the quality of these thumb drives. I didn't find any issues with them. I use them for the designs that I purchased online and use them again and again with no issues. No need to format them. These are priced reasonably and do what they were intended for. Data saved is of good quality. I recommend them, and will purchase again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked as well as expected.
reviews.reviewText: Price could be a little lower/better. Otherwise, was delivered in good condition and ready to use. Thank you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars files disappear when flash is removed from computer.
reviews.reviewText: These are hugely unreliable. I tried reformatting (quick and not-quick, FAT and ExFAT) and nothing helped. These are like defective condoms that break 90% of the time -- if you are depending on them, you will quickly be disappointed. I asked for a refund. When you copy to the drive, the file folders will likely be visisble. But when you unplug the drive and re-insert it., some of the folders will likely be empty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My storage is to store word documents, not pictures or videos
reviews.reviewText: Good morning, I like these flash/thumb drives. The reason I bought them is to store word documents that do not require a lot of space. I am used to pushing the usb side out to plug into my tower, however, I am not disappointed to slide/move a shiny protective shield to one side to put into my tower. I like the lanyard. We have to squeeze the loop at the end together to push it through the opening on the flash drive. Like threding a needle, only easier. Surprisingly excellent job packaging them. Each seal/unseal bag has ten flash drives. It is quite a heavy box. There are fifty of them. Compared to the price I would have had to pay from other stores/sites, this is an excellent buy! I could have used CD's, then I would have had to buy jewel cases. I like these better. Have a great day!On another note, did you know there are prescriptions for us to get from a licensed medical doctor to stop drinking alcohol or stop smoking cigerattes. Mine works and my sister does not want to smoke cigerates.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Use these all the time for music and pictures

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive, fits perfectly
reviews.reviewText: Well made, good value, that's why I paced a second order....

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023

reviews.reviewText: Compré las memorias en color azul metálico y nos gustaron mucho, las mandamos a grabar con el logo de la empresa y se ve muy profesional. Sinceramente pensé que me iba a salir una dañada o que no se leyera pero afortunadamente todas salieron en muy buen estado y todas se leyeron correctamente.
Excelente producto. Lo use para grabar audios, fue muy rápido y no solo salió uno dañado
Algunos no se pueden leer pero son pocos y en general muy bien
